beforeStages.name: Navigate to the New Item Page.

steps.name: Go to the New Item Page by clicking New Item button.
Navigate to "NewItemPage"
Create new Multi-configuration project: "'MyProject'"
Scroll to element
Assert that 'Inspect build log for published build scans' checkbox is selected
Click 'Inspect build log for published build scans' checkbox in Environment section
Wait for the element to be visible
Scroll to element
